item.title: Avoiding overgeneralizations
item.description: This strand of work uses artificial language learning methods to explore different theories about how we children lean to avoid overgeneralization errors: When children learn their mother tongue, they sometimes make errors such as “he giggled me!”, “she fell me over!” or “carry me teddy”.
